Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created: 17.02.2014 (based on copy of BAD150)
-- Variables uses for NL format
-- Initialize parameters if empty
-- Constants uses for NL format
Workaround SCR 9141
On iSeries we only get Lf at the end of lines instead of the required CrLf (0D0A
ATM GB723 does not work in NL
Since we do not have a fixed record length we cannot hardcode the complete CrLf
with format option none for the I/O file (leaves rest of form length as spaces
at end of line or beginning of next line depending on where the CrLf is put)
Therefore we add the Cr (0D chr(13) at the end of the line if running on iSeries
... only update flags to enable restarts if updates have to be performed
.. Determine path/filnename to store file
... reset virtual
... convert outgoing file
... update flags to enable restarts if updates have to be performed
-- Header rows only necessary for NL format
Even if no details written we still write MULTfor update of LGCH_TRANSFERRED
(only update flags to enable restarts if updates have to be performed)
-- A total row in case of differences is only necessary for NL format
@Total row in case of differences is blocked because of necessary recalculations which is not allwed
-- Total rows, only if no details were written to file
... in NL format

... before first detail row, print header

the output file but one line with the sum of V.AMOUNT of all LGCC rows with
with the same LGCC_DATE / LGCC_LDGR_NO / LGCC_PROGID / LGCC_CURRENCY, see GS
